sentences.en: " Do you rehearse in the afternoons? "
sentences.cn: “ 你们下午也排演 吗 ? " 一次,赫斯渥问道.

sentences.en: Angus: Me, too. Now, we better rehearse some carols!
sentences.cn: 安格斯: 我也一样, 我们最好是排练一些圣诞颂歌吧!

sentences.en: Choose a cast and rehearse, then perform your play for the class.
sentences.cn: 选择演员阵容并排练, 然后为班级表演你们的游戏.

sentences.en: I came here today intending to rehearse it with Edmund - by ourselves - against the evening.
sentences.cn: 我今天到这里来是想和埃德蒙一起排练的 —— 俩人自己先练一练,为晚上做个准备.

sentences.en: I think we need to rehearse the first scene again.
sentences.cn: 我想我们需要把第一场再排练一次。

sentences.en: I was tempted to stay and hear this superb orchestra rehearse.
sentences.cn: 我真想留下来听这支高超的管弦乐队排练.

sentences.en: Let us very briefly rehearse one or two facts about nuclear beta decay.
sentences.cn: 让我们非常简要地复述一下有关该β衰变的一两件事实.

sentences.en: Our theatrical company will rehearse and stage a small theatre drama.
sentences.cn: 我们剧社将排演一出小剧场话剧.

sentences.en: Rehearse and role-play the interview with a friend beforehand.
sentences.cn: 事先和朋友通过角色扮演排练一下面试。

sentences.en: The actors began to rehearse a few scenes.
sentences.cn: 演员们开始排练剧中的几场戏.

sentences.en: Then the actor and Natalie would rehearse and George would give notes.
sentences.cn: 然后这个演员和娜塔莉会再排演一次,乔治会给出评论.

sentences.en: Usually, Yasha began to rehearse two weeks before the opening.
sentences.cn: 雅夏通常在演出以前排练两个礼拜.

sentences.en: We can rehearse in this open space.
sentences.cn: 这片空场刚好让我们排练用!

sentences.en: We continued to rehearse / continued rehearsing the chorus after the break.
sentences.cn: 休息之后我们继续排练合唱节目.

sentences.en: We encouraged them to rehearse what they were going to say.
sentences.cn: 我们鼓励他们默述一下他们要说的内容。

sentences.en: We were given only two weeks to rehearse.
sentences.cn: 只给了我们两个星期排练。

words.tran_cn: 排演；预演；练习；训练；叙述

trans.tran_cn: 排练， 预演； 详述
trans.tran_en: to practise or make people practise something such as a play or concert in order to prepare for a public performance

trans.tran_cn: 详述，在排演中指挥，经训练使熟练掌握，复述，背诵
